column4: hello, I would like to know if there is any app out there for a master computer to control other computers in a network for a cybercafe. The main computer will use ubuntu, and the rest will use windows. Any suggestions?
sounds like you'll need a Windows application for this, and #ubuntu is not the best place to ask about that :)
ok, what if I install ubuntu on all computers? how can I get control over the network. Lets say, enable/disable a computer, restart, block, etc???
I wouldn't know about that. Maybe someone else in #ubuntu does, though.
